channel.title: Area Actions v1.6.4, SML 2.1.1, Experimental 121119
channel.description:
Area Actions (as the only mod installed, on a fresh world) only shows the left half of it's menu. The selection side works fine, but the actions side is blank.
Flight button works as expected as well.
I know SML 2.1.1 just came out, so many mods may have to make some adjustments. I just wanted to make sure my favorite mod was on the to-do list.

item.title: Area Actions v1.6.4, SML 2.1.1, Experimental 121119
